meanings.definition: Combine into a single whole or unit.
meanings.sent1: She consolidates her toys into one box.
meanings.sent2: The company consolidates its branches to save costs.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces consolidate into a perfect picture.
meanings.sent4: His leadership consolidates the team like glue.
meanings.sent5: The recipe consolidates all the flavors beautifully.

meanings.sent1: Eating healthy food consolidates your body.
meanings.sent2: Exercise consolidates your muscles and bones.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's suit consolidates his powers.
meanings.sent4: Her determination consolidates her resolve like steel.
meanings.sent5: The friendship consolidates over shared experiences.

meanings.definition: Bring together into a single unit or system.
meanings.sent1: The software consolidates data from different sources.
meanings.sent2: The treaty consolidates the alliance between nations.
meanings.sent3: The party consolidates people from all walks of life.
meanings.sent4: Music consolidates emotions into a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: Education consolidates knowledge for future use.
